statements.name: PROC MIGRATE
statements.description: Migrates a SAS library forward to the current release of SAS.

arguments.name: IN=
arguments.description: names the source SAS library from which to migrate members.

arguments.name: OUT=
arguments.description: names the target SAS library to contain the migrated members.

arguments.name: BUFSIZE=
arguments.description: specifies the buffer page size of the members that are written to the target library.

arguments.name: KEEPSIZE
arguments.description: retains (clones) the page size of members from the source library.

arguments.name: ENCODING=
arguments.description: specifies the session encoding that was used when formats catalogs were created.

arguments.name: MOVE
arguments.description: deletes the original members from the source library.

arguments.name: SLIBREF=
arguments.description: specifies a libref that is assigned through a SAS/CONNECT server.

arguments.name: KEEPNODUPKEY
arguments.description: specifies to retain the NODUPKEY sort order.
